last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 12
last_episode_to_air.overview: It's the grand finale and two challenges are left before one Maker wins the $100,000. The challenges are all getting the party started: Makers have three hours to create a 3D invitation to a pop-up party.

name: Making It Australia
overview: From pottery, pyrography and macramé, to carving, crocheting and even a Chris Hemsworth lampshade, Making It Australia is the heart-felt, inspirational and epic new crafting and DIY series, lockdown has us craving for. Making It Australia brings together the country’s most talented Makers to showcase their artistic genius, under the watchful eyes of our hilarious hosts Susie Youssef and Harley Breen.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Susie Youssef, Harley Breen and judges Benja Harney and Deborah Riley present this crafty series. What our makers create will be beyond your wildest imagination. If you can dream it, you can create it.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Twelve makers return to the barn with just 10 eliminations to go before finding out who wins the $100,000 and the patch for Master Maker. The challenges on this episode are all about going back to their childhood.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Eleven makers return to the crafting barn for two Home Sweet Home themed challenges. Our makers have three hours to create a Hometown Diorama set inside a glass jar.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: This episode is all about food! Craft you can eat, food that's been crafted, art that's edible. First, Makers have three hours to work in a pair to create a classic food pair costume.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: The theme for this episode is all about reusing, recycling and repurposing. In the Faster Craft, the makers are tasked with making a unique light fixture from second-hand materials.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: The makers are tasked to create their own backyard oasis in this Mega Craft Challenge. Having eight hours to build, they must include a focal point in their oasis such as a fire pit, barbecue or fountain.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: In this episode, Makers have three hours to create a functional musical instrument. This instrument should feel unusual and innovative, and take inspiration from the part music has played in their lives.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: The remaining six Makers are asked to create a well-designed invention, device or gadget which needs to solve a problem in your life or in the life of a loved one.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: In this episode, Makers have three hours to create a comfort toy for children in need. Special guest judge, The Queen of Craft, Tonia Todman helps the judges in deciding who wins the Master Craft patch.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: The last five Makers are faced with a Mega Craft challenge: Shed Hack. The 11-hour build is all about revamping the traditional garden shed, and to turn it into something beyond a storage facility.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: It is the semifinal and there is only one more episode before one Maker wins the $100,000 and the patch for Master Maker. These challenges are all about hopes and dreams.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: It's the grand finale and two challenges are left before one Maker wins the $100,000. The challenges are all getting the party started: Makers have three hours to create a 3D invitation to a pop-up party.
